[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Real

abbrev omnimath3214_answer : ℝ := sorry
theorem omnimath3214 : 
  IsLeast {t : ℝ | 0 < t ∧ ∃ (walk_dist : Fin 3 → ℝ) (ride_dist : Fin 3 → ℝ),
    (∀ i, walk_dist i ≤ 6 * t) ∧      (∀ i, ride_dist i ≤ 90 * t) ∧      (∀ i, walk_dist i + ride_dist i = 135) ∧      (∀ s : Finset (Fin 3), s.card = 2 → ∑ i in s, ride_dist i ≤ 90 * t)    } omnimath3214_answer := by sorry. Enumerated answers: t = 2.70 feasible solutions:
